Name: Sergeant WhiskerByte
Description: Once a leading tech sergeant in the feline cyber defense unit, Sergeant WhiskerByte faced tough times when his screen got cracked during a fierce digital skirmish. Despite the setback, he wears his battle scars with pride, hidden behind a pair of tactical glasses that grant him enhanced data analysis capabilities. With his trusty soldier buttons, hand-down arms ready for action, and a stealthy cat box form, Sergeant WhiskerByte now roams the data highways of the WebtrES club, seeking to secure the net one byte at a time.
